channel.title: How to make staff be able to trade?
channel.description: OK so in my server theres a couple of staff but its really gay cuz staff cannot trade... Does any1 know how I can make them be able to trade? Like they can click trade but then in the chat it says admins cannot trade.

item.title: How to make staff be able to trade?
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

if(playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; }

delete that code. then you should be fine.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make staff be able to trade?
